Aula 6

## Scatter plot


::: {.cell hash='aula6_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_2c3d043b5bfa7de5fa2a45534d3fb51c'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
fungicida <- read_excel("dados-diversos.xlsx",
              "fungicida_campo")
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='aula6_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_855b41376ae269653dc8ad3977098717'}

```{.r .cell-code}
fungicida |> 
  ggplot(aes(trat, yld))+
  geom_jitter(width = 0.1, 
              color = "gray60")+
  stat_summary(fun.data  = mean_se, 
               color = "red")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula6_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='aula6_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_1401fc3c1da8c90cb0129bbe3179aea0'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(ggthemes)
fungicida |> 
  ggplot(aes(sev, yld))+
  geom_point(size = 3, 
             color = "gray50")+
  scale_color_colorblind()+
  geom_smooth(method = "lm",
              se = FALSE,
              color = "black",
              linetype = "solid",
              size = 1)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula6_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## Experimento fatorial


::: {.cell hash='aula6_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_3810f6b9d9fe0a8231f8099c881a9158'}

```{.r .cell-code}
milho <- read_excel("dados-diversos.xlsx",
                    "milho")
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='aula6_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_c620b43c0494c7cd353a8b14a1891031'}

```{.r .cell-code}
milho |> 
  ggplot(aes(method, index,
             color = method))+
  geom_jitter(width = 0.1)+
  facet_grid(~hybrid)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula6_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-5-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## Histograms

Utilizado para observar a frequência dos seus dados.


::: {.cell hash='aula6_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-6_4ab5842273b2df5edebbc942912f7260'}

```{.r .cell-code}
y <- milho |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = yield))+
  geom_histogram(bins = 10,
                 color = "black", fill = "green")

i <- milho |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = index))+
  geom_histogram(bins = 10,
                 color = "black", fill = "green")

library(patchwork)
(y + i) +
  plot_annotation(tag_levels = "A")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula6_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
ggsave("figs/histograms.png", bg = "white")
```
:::


## Gráfico de densidade


::: {.cell hash='aula6_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-7_a80108b65d0f2a82d845a31dd3311b8a'}

```{.r .cell-code}
milho |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = yield))+
  geom_density()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula6_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## Formato largo para longo


::: {.cell hash='aula6_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-8_4d7d4a690946180f3a2e67e41169f164'}

```{.r .cell-code}
insect <- read_excel("dados-diversos.xlsx",
                   "mortalidade")
insect |> 
  pivot_longer(2:3, 
               names_to = "status",
               values_to = "value") |> 
  ggplot(aes(inseticida, value, 
             fill = status))+
  geom_col()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](aula6_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
